levels.description: When deploying, deals <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as True damage to enemies in the four adjacent tiles and <$ba.stun>Stuns</> them for <@ba.vup>{stun}</> seconds. If the previously deployed Operator is from Kazimierz, deals an additional hit
